name: I love you, Bertha!
description:
On Valentine's Day customary to dedicate creativity to your halves, but I want to dedicate it to my best friend

Bertha, Betichka and Mother of the whole house

She died a week ago, left so quickly and unexpectedly. The disease turned out to be more insidious..

She was and always remains in my heart a little hostess, a beauty and a little bit spiteful, but so beloved

She's been with me for half of my life, 11 years, and I've been with her since she was 2 weeks old

I want her to stay in your heart.She deserves to live forever as an NFT and super cool kitty!

I love you, Bertha! I hope you feel good in heaven!

2080х2942 | 300 .dpi | .PNG
